alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Thomas, northwestern Sheridan and southwestern Decatur Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Rexford to near Menlo. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selden and Hoxie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
